Class VehicleFactory

java.lang.Object
com.algonquin.www.common.factory.VehicleFactory
public class VehicleFactory extends Object
Factory class responsible for creating VehicleDTO instances based on the vehicle type.

This class uses the VehicleDTOBuilder to construct vehicles with predefined properties such as energy type, consumption rate, maximum passengers, and status depending on the vehicle type.

Supported vehicle types:

  • Bus
  • Light Rail
  • Train

 Example usage:
 VehicleDTO bus = VehicleFactory.createVehicle("BUS123", VehicleTypeConstants.BUS, "Route A");
See Also:
  • VehicleDTO
  • VehicleDTOBuilder
  • VehicleTypeConstants
  • VehicleStatusConstants

  • Method Details

    • createVehicle

      public static VehicleDTO createVehicle(String vehicleNumber, String vehicleType, String route)
      Creates and returns a VehicleDTO object for the given vehicle number, type, and route.

      The vehicle properties such as energy type, consumption rate, max passengers, and status are set according to the vehicle type.

      Parameters:
      vehicleNumber - the unique identifier of the vehicle
      vehicleType - the type of the vehicle (e.g., "bus", "lightRail", "train")
      route - the route assigned to the vehicle
      Returns:
      a fully constructed VehicleDTO instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the vehicle type is unknown
